Room.Name: Ministry Way/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Neilian Drive and Ministry Way.
Room.LongDescription: Ministry Way runs north and south through the intersection with Neilian Drive, which runs east and west. Ministry Way is a small road which runs between Orchard Lane and Lelion Way. On the southeast are a number of small religious centers and on the northeast are the Oceancrest Ministries.
